pages.text: One, for whom it is not right to speak against Allah aught but the truth. I have come to you with a manifest sign from my Lord. Send, then, the children of Israel with me
Said he (Pharaoh), "If you have come with a Sign, then bring it, if you are truthful
Then he (Moses) threw his rod down, and lo! It was a manifest serpent
And he drew out his hand, and lo! It was white to the beholders
Said the chiefs of Pharaoh´s people, "Verily, this is surely a knowing (expert) magician
He desires to turn you out of your land. What is it, then, your advise
They said, "Delay him and his brother, and send summoners into the cities
To bring unto you every knowing (expert) magician
And the magician came to Pharaoh and said, "Is there, indeed, a reward for us if we are victors
He answered, "Yea! And you shall be of those who are brought nigh unto me (given high posts, ranks or honour)
They said, "O Moses! Will you cast down (your rod) or shall we be (first) to throw
Said he, "Throw first". And when they threw down their rods, they bewitched (hypnotized) the people´s eyes, and struck terror into them, for they did a mighty magic
But We inspired Moses (saying), "Throw down your rod." and it swallowed up their lying show
And the truth stood fast, and vain was that which they had done
Thus were they vanquished there, and turned back humiliated
And the magicians threw themselves down in prostration
